sentences.en: Closures provide named ( lazy ) variables associated with each parse rule invocation.
sentences.cn: 闭包提供了与每次规则调用相关联的命名 ( 惰性 ) 变量.

sentences.en: Could not resolve the invocation to the correct constructor.
sentences.cn: 未能解析对正确构造函数的调用.

sentences.en: Do not use late - binding invocation when early - binding is possible.
sentences.cn: 只要可以用 前期 绑定就不要用后期绑定.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page and glue between functions to add an invocation.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上并在函数间粘附,可以添加调用.

sentences.en: Each method in the event invocation list must be called.
sentences.cn: 在事件调用列表中的每个方法都必须被调用.

sentences.en: Every question I ask an invocation of power.
sentences.cn: 每个我问的问句,都能启动力量.

sentences.en: Glue between functions to add an invocation to a diagram.
sentences.cn: 在函数间粘附,将调用添加到图表中.

sentences.en: If so, it must iterate the entire invocation list.
sentences.cn: 如果是, 它必须迭代整个调用列表.

sentences.en: Inside a multicast delegate invocation, each target is called in succession.
sentences.cn: 在多播委托的内部, 每个对象会被连续的调用.

sentences.en: Neither invocation of the format - Undo would affect the content.
sentences.cn: 第2次按下格式撤销键会恢复斜体操作,但格式撤销不会影响内容.

sentences.en: Not every invocation of the doctrine of pre - emption will be justified.
sentences.cn: 不是任何情况下对预防性原则的引用都是正当的.

sentences.en: Please stand and pledge the flag, after which Dr. Jerome Taylor will give the invocation.
sentences.cn: 请起立对旗宣誓，之后杰尔姆·泰勒博士将做祈祷。

sentences.en: The APIs use remote method invocation as their remote communication mechanism.
sentences.cn: 这些API采用远程方法调用作为远程通信机理.

sentences.en: The representation of a procedure created by the invocation of that procedure.
sentences.cn: 由过程调用产生的该过程的表示.

sentences.en: Therefore, any exception that the target throws ends the delegate invocation chain.
sentences.cn: 果彼,纲本抛进的免何同常都会末行拜托链的调用.

trans.tran_cn: 祈祷，乞求，乞灵，乞求神助
trans.tran_en: An invocation is a request for help or forgiveness made to a god
